text:
Boomrat (www.boomrat.com), fully funded by Live Nation, is hiring software engineers to continue building and scaling an EDM (music) platform. Stack: Backbone, Laravel, Redis, Mysql in a Service Oriented Architecture.

You: Curious, work smart, have a voice.

Work in a rapid development environment with engineers to implement a growing architecture on the latest cloud technology. Be directly involved in scaling the platform, building services, creating UIs. Work on any part of the stack.

Please contact michael@boomrat.com if you are seeking a challenge.

Boomrat is located in Hollywood.
